messages.message: Has anyone recently been able to launch api-server-apps locally from the vscode debugger? I used to be able to but it is just exiting before the service starts fully

It seems like `python manage.py gevent_server` doesn't actually run the `gevent_server` flask command and manage.py finishes without actually doing anything to start the server. This used to work for me but I'm not sure what changed
This broke between 22.07 and 22.08 - it looks like we changed the flask version in between those releases which might have changed how the cli behaves and broken our launch script
